## sample size calculation 

### Eskow Mealy 

```{r, echo=T, message=F, warning=F}
mean_difference=1.5; #  mean difference  
SD=1.36;  
sample_size=numeric()
for (i in 1:length(mean_difference))
  sample_size[i]=round(power.t.test(power = .80, delta = mean_difference[i], alternative = "two.sided", type="paired", sig.level=0.05, sd=SD)$n)

data.frame(mean_difference, sample_size)%>%
datatable(extensions = 'Buttons',
          caption="Cortical FDBA",
            options = list(dom = 'Blfrtip',
                           buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'),
                           lengthMenu = list(c(10,25,50,-1),
                                             c(10,25,50,"All"))))
```

### walker 


```{r, echo=T, message=F, warning=F}
mean_difference=abs(-2.48+1.16); #  mean difference  
SD=max(2.86, 1.97);  
sample_size=numeric()
for (i in 1:length(mean_difference))
  sample_size[i]=round(power.t.test(power = .80, delta = mean_difference[i], alternative = "two.sided", type="paired", sig.level=0.05, sd=SD)$n)

data.frame(mean_difference, sample_size)%>%
datatable(extensions = 'Buttons',
          caption="Mid-Socket:3 mm vs 5 mm",
            options = list(dom = 'Blfrtip',
                           buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'),
                           lengthMenu = list(c(10,25,50,-1),
                                             c(10,25,50,"All"))))
```
